title: Bilgewater Lore Question
body:
So i dont want to pee on anyone's cornflakes here regarding the new lore,which is AWESOME i might add,but where is {{champion:105}}  ? in his ingame lore he was at first regarded as a troublemaker but after taking down a monster-shark-thing he was hailed a hero of bilgewater of sorts,enough to even earn a quote from Miss Fortune.So since this is a Bilgewater event where he at?Does the Lore Team have other plans for him outside of Bilgewater?Did he went on an eating spree and become {{champion:223}} ?Or did he just decide this whole ordeal was too boring?

Jokes aside would like to get some insight into this matter if thats not asking for too much :)

replies.body:
We wanted to keep a strong focus on the central characters of the story. We talked about various Champions we could involve, but it then becomes shoehorning things in, or having cameos that aren't satisfying.

So no, sorry, Fizz and the others won't be making an appearance in this story.

Hmm yea i can agree with that,hey thanks for the clear up!and so far AWESOME job on the bilgewater event,i mean this event is currently being a beam of joy in an otherwise sad story about league lore.Congratulations to those involved this is ridiculously good.And while i don't want to take away any credit from the art team involved in the design of those  "explore the world" segments we get,that help us get a clearer image of how those parts of bilgewater look like,i have to admit that the storytelling to my eyes are prime material,Best-selling Fantasy Novel material i dare say.And honestly i don't feel like I'm exaggerating,it's that good.

Anyway sorry for using your response to the question i posed to say other things,i just wanted it to be known that i,like many many others,are currently enjoying the heck of the new event and its lore,congratulations and keep it up :)
Thank you very much, the Events team and all of Narrative is stoked at the response so far. Thank you for reading and taking part.

Fizz, Nami, Nautilus and Tahm aren't gonna be a part of this event sadly, they're dealing with other things.
ohhh :( at least tahm got a reference :(
Keep in mind Bilgewater's not only Rat Town and Butcher's Bridge. There's a whole island chain yet to explore, so Fizz, Nami, Nautilus and Tahm can still have their time to shine yet!
yaaaaay then would love seeing at least some references to them like the tahm kench one in act 2 :)
I want to see what my girl Nami is up to tho.
